section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Bungee jump" means jumping or falling by an individual from a height while attached to a rope or cord that is elastic, rubber, or latex.
"Bungee jumping operation" means an operation that allows an individual to bungee jump for a fee or dues.

text.section: A person may not conduct a bungee jumping operation.
A person who violates subsection (b) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $2,500 or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or both.
